Name: Falconi
Ingredients: 45 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Spirit-forward, dry and subtly aromatic. Made more accessable with either bourbon in place of rye and/or ruby port in place of tawny port.
Nutrition: One serving of Falconi contains 162 calories
